scripts.theme:lux: copyfiles -f ./src/themes/bootstrap.lux.css ./node_modules/bootstrap/dist/css && node -e "require('fs').rename('./node_modules/bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.lux.css', './node_modules/bootstrap/dist/css/bootswatch.css', function(err) { if (err) console.log(err); console.log('Theme lux installed!') })"
